name: Motorbike tour to Thac Ba lake
description:
In love with two wheels but not having weeks to ride along the country? Let’s enjoy our Vietnam short motorbike tours.
This motorbike tour is our chance to see many beautiful mountain passes, stunning winding road, chance to see breathtaking landscapes and friendly people. We will discover the local ethnic people’s culture by staying with them, sharing meals, and enjoying homemade rice wine.

In this trip, you will experience Mai Chau – the real Montagnard village, Moc Chau highland with vast tea hills, Thac Ba - one of the largest and most beautiful artificial lakes of Vietnam. It boasts clear water surrounded by mountains and tropical forests. There are 30 different ethnic groups living in surrounding regions of Thac Ba Lake such as: Tay, Nung, Thai, Muong, Cao Lan and Kho Mu… still proudly keep their primitive traditions and customs.
